definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: We don't have any information from inside the plant.
sentences.chinese: 我們還沒有任何來自核電站裏面的消息，這是個問題。

sentences.english: Metsamor lies on some of Earth's most earthquake-prone terrain.
sentences.chinese: Metsamor核電站位於地球上地震多發的地帶。

sentences.english: Banks are not lining up to lend money on their own for construction of the newest generation of Indian Points.
sentences.chinese: 銀行不會自願貸款給新一代印點核電站的建造。

sentences.english: The ratio of corrective to preventive maintenance is high relative to best performing NPPs of similar design…
sentences.chinese: 的比例相對而言高於設計相似且實績最佳的核電廠。

sentences.english: The basic requirements in nuclear safety review are clarified for class 1E cables of nu- clear power plants.
sentences.chinese: 闡明對核電廠1E級電纜核安全審查的基本要求。

sentences.english: Bulgaria has abandoned plans to build a new nuclear power station at Belene.
sentences.chinese: 保加利亞放棄了在貝勒尼新建一座核電站的計劃。

sentences.english: It depends on the plant.It depends on whether it's a boiling-water reactor or a pressurized-water reactor.
sentences.chinese: 這要看核電站的類型，它是沸水堆還是壓水堆。

sentences.english: But the wind business is new to Exelon, the nation's largest operator of nuclear power plants.
sentences.chinese: 而風業務是新艾斯，全國最大的核電站運營商。

sentences.english: What about radiation levels outside the plant?
sentences.chinese: 核電站外的輻射水平如何？

sentences.english: Worker dies at Japan's tsunami-hit nuclear plant.
sentences.chinese: 日本參加核電站泄漏搶險的一名工人死亡。

sentences.english: Engineers have now connected a power cable to the outside of the plant.
sentences.chinese: 工程師們已經將一根電纜線連到核電站外圍。

sentences.english: The safety problem of Nuclear Power Plants (NPPs) has been discussed due to its catastrophic consequences.
sentences.chinese: 核電站的安全問題一直被社會所關注。

sentences.english: The nuclear industry tactic transferred and the nuclear power grew up rapidly since the reform and opening of China.
sentences.chinese: 改革開放以來，核工業戰略轉移，核電產業迅速崛起。

sentences.english: Evacuees from the area around the Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear Plant receive a meal at an evacuation center in Namie.
sentences.chinese: 福島第一核電站附近被疏散人員在疏散中心接受配餐。

sentences.english: The storage pools for radioactive spent fuel at Fukushima have also posed a threat.
sentences.chinese: 福島核電站的核廢料池也同樣存在威脅。

sentences.english: We are near the Oskarshamn nuclear power station in south-east Sweden.
sentences.chinese: 我們現在在瑞典東南部的奧斯卡港核電站附近。

definition: a power station/an electricity generating plant
to generate electricity/to send a telegram
privately run (i.e. by a company, not the state)
operator (of a power station, transport network etc)/carrier (telecommunications etc)
